On this page

Last Supported Office Versions per macOS ​

This document outlines the last supported versions of Microsoft Office Suite for different macOS releases. The tables below include the file names, versions, and direct clickable image download links for the installers for each supported macOS version.

Each macOS version section will display the following information:

  • macOS Version: The macOS release with the last supported Office version.
  • File Name: The name of the installer file for the Office Suite or BusinessPro version.
  • Version: The specific version of Microsoft Office compatible with the macOS release.
  • Download: A clickable image link that allows you to download the installer directly.

macOS 12.7.6 Monterey ​

The last supported Microsoft Office Suite versions for macOS 12.7.6 Monterey are listed below.

File NameVersionDownload
Microsoft Office Suite Installer16.88
Microsoft BusinessPro Suite Installer16.88
Word Standalone Installer16.88
Excel Standalone Installer16.88
PowerPoint Standalone Installer16.88.1
Outlook Standalone Installer16.88.1
OneNote Standalone Installer16.88

macOS 11.7.10 Big Sur ​

The last supported Microsoft Office Suite versions for macOS 11.7.10 Big Sur are listed below.

File NameVersionDownload
Microsoft Office Suite Installer16.77
Microsoft BusinessPro Suite Installer16.77
Word Standalone Installer16.77.1
Excel Standalone Installer16.77.1
PowerPoint Standalone Installer16.77.1
Outlook Standalone Installer16.77.1
OneNote Standalone Installer16.77

macOS 10.15.7 Catalina ​

The last supported Microsoft Office Suite versions for macOS 10.15.7 Catalina are listed below.

File NameVersionDownload
Microsoft Office Suite Installer16.66
Microsoft BusinessPro Suite Installer16.66
Word Standalone Installer16.66.1
Excel Standalone Installer16.66.1
PowerPoint Standalone Installer16.66.1
Outlook Standalone Installer16.66.2
OneNote Standalone Installer16.66.1

macOS 10.14.6 Mojave ​

The last supported Microsoft Office Suite versions for macOS 10.14.6 Mojave are listed below.

File NameVersionDownload
Microsoft Office Suite Installer16.54
Microsoft BusinessPro Suite Installer16.54
Word Standalone Installer16.54
Excel Standalone Installer16.54
PowerPoint Standalone Installer16.54
Outlook Standalone Installer16.54
OneNote Standalone Installer16.54

macOS 10.13.6 High Sierra ​

The last supported Microsoft Office Suite versions for macOS 10.13.6 High Sierra are listed below.

File NameVersionDownload
Microsoft Office Suite Installer16.43
Microsoft BusinessPro Suite Installer16.43
Word Standalone Installer16.43
Excel Standalone Installer16.43
PowerPoint Standalone Installer16.43
Outlook Standalone Installer16.43
OneNote Standalone Installer16.43

Need a Specific Version? ​

If you need a specific version of Microsoft Office for your macOS, you can find a full list of all supported versions on the Update History.

This page provides detailed information on all available versions of Microsoft Office Suite and standalone apps for macOS, including older versions that might still be needed for compatibility reasons.
